channel.title: Need item.java help
channel.description:
This is my problem....
[code]Item.java:139: ')' expected return Capes[(int)(Math.random()capes.length)]; ^ Item.java:139: not a statement return Capes[(int)(Math.random()capes.length)]; ^ Item.java:139: ';' expected return Capes[(int)(Math.random()capes.length)]; ^ 3 errors Files compiled correctly. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
heres what i got in that spot:
[code] return Capes[(int)(Math.random()capes.length)];[/code]
